initialMsg: Welcome to Mirchi Chat! if you have any problem on Mirchi Chat, please report to us through feedback. Have fun on Mirchi Chat!!

questionsWithReply.question: How to be a member?
questionsWithReply.reply: Click[Profile]->[Membership center], and then purchase the corresponding membership package as needed

questionsWithReply.question: Cancel subscription
questionsWithReply.reply: You can unsubscribe in Google Pay if necessary

questionsWithReply.question: Why am I banned?
questionsWithReply.reply:
You can check the most common reasons to be banned:
a) creating fake account
b) sending in appropriate texts or picture
c) asking others for money
d)teenagers under 18: According to the rules and laws, this app could only be used by adult over 18 years old
e) selling or recommending other websites, or introducing users to other sites
f) a user will be banned when we receive multiple reports from other users

questionsWithReply.question: Report & Complaints
questionsWithReply.reply: In order to solve your problem, we need you to provide more detailed information, please <u>click here</u> to submit feedback.
